attributes.action: Release a GPS database of road speed limits, instead of cameras. This would prove the Goverments intentions were safety and the motorists intentions are to abide by the speed limit. THE TECHNOLOGY IS ALREADY HERE FOR THIS. Just takes a little software to advise the driver of the current speed limit and when the speed limit changes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The average motorist want's a system that keeps them within the speed limit without being distracted from road observations.

INCREASES SAFETY-SAVES MONEY-SAVES LIVES
*** ENDS THE SPEED CAMERA ARGUMENT ***
